entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
